content.raw:
Nice. Just one issue I found was that the model editor link also gets pasted outside of model editor mode

Steps to reproduce:

- enter editor mode

- insert a box from the left palette

- copy and paste the box somewhere

- exit editor mode

- insert a sphere model

- copy and paste the sphere model to see the semi-transparent box link visual also being pasted
content.html:
Nice. Just one issue I found was that the model editor link also gets pasted outside of model editor mode

Steps to reproduce:

  • enter editor mode

  • insert a box from the left palette

  • copy and paste the box somewhere

  • exit editor mode

  • insert a sphere model

  • copy and paste the sphere model to see the semi-transparent box link visual also being pasted
